Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Reroute near 43rd/Wabash
ShortDescription: 43 43rd buses temp. rerouted EB: 43rd, Wabash, 41st, Michigan, & 43rd; WB: 43rd, Indiana, 41st, Wabash, & 43rd, due to street blockage near 43rd/Wabash.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 43rd/Wabash, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 43rd, Wabash, 41st, Michigan, & 43rd.

Westbound buses will operate via 43rd, Indiana, 41st, Wabash, & 43rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute near 79th/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses temp. rerouted EB: 79th, King Drive, 75th, South Chicago, 76th, Stony Island, & 79th; WB: 79th, South Chicago, 75th, King Drive, & 79th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 79th/Cottage Grove, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 79th, King Drive, 75th, South Chicago, 76th, Stony Island, & 79th.

Westbound buses will operate via 79th, South Chicago, 75th, King Drive, & 79th.

Allow extra travel time.
